original_text: Therefore Jesus no longer moved about publicly among the people of Judea. Instead he withdrew to a region near the wilderness, to a village called Ephraim, where he stayed with his disciples.
korean_text: 그러므로 예수께서 다시 유대인 가운데 드러나게 다니지 아니하시고 거기를 떠나 빈 들 가까운 곳인 에브라임이라는 동네에 가서 제자들과 함께 거기 머무르시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore Jesus no longer moved about publicly
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 예수님은 더 이상 공개적으로 움직이지 않으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: to a region near the wilderness
where he stayed with his disciples
